metadata.description:
the original version of trip appears on my album "she is the future" When the band and I were preparing for live performances we decided to record this version. The live instrumentation did something to the record that enriched the entire listening experience. I'm ready to take a trip to art basel miami. meet me there. 

trip is a hypnotic rare .wav 
recorded live instrumentation from new orleans may 22'
written and performed by charm taylor 
andreu karnigie bass
lauren fuller keys
winowilly on drumpads \
cover art a.i. chrm

lyrics.text:
chasing long days
Working long nights
i want no fighting no fussing
Just fortune and flights
this time
-----
I'm talking
Continental coastin
Ease is the motion
Real love potion

Four days at sea
We spent every day 
floating 
toasting

Skin sticky
Slim thicky
Gon lick me like post it
im posted
You go deep as the ocean ..

Wavy baby
made a baby cuz its potent
Seasons ova and you cuffed me
Trust me
You got them front row seats

Trekking across the desert
Getting quite dusty
Been around the world
But you a first class freak

I know you knew some other girls
But they ain't no me no me..
im from that state show me
When we stateside tell em you for me
----
Hook: I wanna take me a trip baby lets live me you morocco baby lets live 
i wanna take me a trip me you kingston
me you habana baby lets live

chasing long days
And long nights
make it all alright

No pain no gain
if we gon fly
if its our time
We gotta stay on the grind right?

Continental coastin
Ease is the motion
Real love potion

Four days at sea
We spent every day floating toasting

Take a lil cat nap
Night cap
and get right back
Touch that

You deep as an ocean ..

Wavy baby
Made a baby
Potent

Don't trip
The air got the right Scent
Windows got the right tint
Go as far as we can get
Jet set
To a sunset
That make me something
Wet we even done yet

Miles away we forget
Miles High -pilot
Miles high-mountain
 take a lil trip

metadata.name: trip (live) #1
